item.title: CNN Liars Slither to New All-Time Low as Politico Hits Rock Bottom
item.description: CNN is so afraid people will find out they’ve been lied to that CNN is lying harder than ever. It is perfectly legal to visit the Wikileaks.com website. You can even copy information found on the site. Yet CNN’s paid liars are telling viewers it’s against the law. Plus, they’re saying the only way you are allowed to learn the content of the Wikileaks documents is to have it filtered through CNN’s official state-sponsored Department of Truth.
